museums.name: National Museum
museums.description: The National Museum in New Delhi is one of the largest museums in India, showcasing a vast collection of artifacts from prehistoric to modern times.

museums.name: National Gallery of Modern Art
museums.description: The National Gallery of Modern Art (NGMA) is the premier art gallery under the Ministry of Culture, housing a vast collection of modern and contemporary Indian art.
museums.location: Jaipur House, India Gate, New Delhi

museums.name: Indira Gandhi Memorial Museum
museums.description: This museum is dedicated to the life and work of former Prime Minister Indira Gandhi, showcasing personal artifacts and photographs from her life.

museums.name: Chhatrapati Shivaji Maharaj Vastu Sangrahalaya
museums.description: Formerly known as the Prince of Wales Museum, this museum houses artifacts from the Indus Valley Civilization and other historical periods of India.

museums.name: Dr. Bhau Daji Lad Museum
museums.description: Mumbai's oldest museum showcasing the city's cultural heritage through a rare collection of fine and decorative arts.

museums.name: RBI Monetary Museum
museums.description: This museum traces the evolution of money and coinage in India, from ancient times to the modern era.
museums.location: Amar Building, Sir Pherozeshah Mehta Road, Fort, Mumbai

museums.name: Indian Museum
museums.description: The oldest and largest museum in India, featuring rare collections of antiques, armor, ornaments, fossils, and Mughal paintings.

museums.name: Victoria Memorial
museums.description: A large marble building dedicated to Queen Victoria, now serving as a museum and tourist destination.
museums.location: Victoria Memorial Hall, 1, Queens Way, Kolkata

museums.name: Netaji Bhawan
museums.description: This museum is dedicated to the life and work of Netaji Subhas Chandra Bose, showcasing personal artifacts and documents related to India's freedom struggle.

museums.name: Albert Hall Museum
museums.description: The oldest museum in Rajasthan, featuring a rich collection of artifacts including paintings, jewelry, carpets, and coins.

museums.name: City Palace Museum
museums.description: Located within the City Palace complex, this museum showcases royal artifacts and the heritage of the Maharajas of Jaipur.

museums.name: Jaipur Wax Museum
museums.description: A unique museum featuring lifelike wax statues of historical figures, celebrities, and sports personalities.

museums.name: Government Museum, Bangalore
museums.description: One of the oldest museums in India, housing artifacts from the Mohenjodaro and Harappan civilizations, along with ancient coins and art.

museums.name: Mysore Sand Sculpture Museum
museums.description: A unique museum featuring intricate sand sculptures depicting various themes from Indian mythology and history.

museums.name: HAL Aerospace Museum
museums.description: India's first aerospace museum, showcasing the growth of the Indian aviation industry and HAL's contributions to Indian aviation.
